DataElement.preferredName: Kaposi Sarcoma Related Edema Limb Anatomic Site
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information relating to the anatomic location of Kaposi Sarcoma (a malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells) related edema (pathological transudate within one or more tissues)._A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity._Named locations of or within the body.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Kaposi Sarcoma Related Edema Anatomic Location
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the anatomic location of Kaposi Sarcoma (a malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells) related edema (pathological transudate within one or more tissues).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells. Erythrocyte extravasation and hemosiderin deposition are frequently present. The most frequent site of involvement is the skin however, it may also occur internally.  It generally develops in people with compromised immune systems including those with acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS).:Related; connected or associated.:Pathological transudate within one or more tissues.(FMA)

Concepts.definition: A malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells. Erythrocyte extravasation and hemosiderin deposition are frequently present. The most frequent site of involvement is the skin; however it may also occur internally. It generally develops in people with compromised immune systems including those with acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS).
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
Accumulation of an excessive amount of fluid in cells or intercellular tissues.

Property.preferredDefinition: Relating to anatomy.:A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.

Concepts.definition: Relating to anatomy.
A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: locations or structures in the human body.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity._Named locations of or within the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Left; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: The distal portion of the upper extremity. It consists of the carpus, metacarpus, and digits.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The distal portion of the upper extremity. It consists of the carpus, metacarpus, and digits.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Right; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: The distal portion of the upper extremity. It consists of the carpus, metacarpus, and digits.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The distal portion of the upper extremity. It consists of the carpus, metacarpus, and digits.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: The terminal part of the lower extremity, especially the part below the ankle.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The structure found below the ankle joint.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: The terminal part of the lower extremity, especially the part below the ankle.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The structure found below the ankle joint.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: The posterior aspect of the lower extremity that extends from the knee to the foot.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The posterior aspect of the lower extremity that extends from the knee to the foot.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: The posterior aspect of the lower extremity that extends from the knee to the foot.: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: The posterior aspect of the lower extremity that extends from the knee to the foot.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The posterior aspect of the lower extremity that extends from the knee to the foot.
Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The posterior aspect of the lower extremity that extends from the knee to the foot.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: A gliding joint between the distal ends of the tibia and fibula and the proximal end of the talus.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
A gliding joint between the distal ends of the tibia and fibula and the proximal end of the talus.
